comment.body:
Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Google Play: com.microsoft.office.outlook

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.office.outlook&hl=en_US](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.microsoft.office.outlook%26hl%3Den_US)
### Comment
> Fresh setup of Outlook on Android. Adguard Public DNS configured at device level. 
> When you go to add a Yahoo account to Outlook, you get an error message and cannot proceed. 
> 
> Disabling Adguard only is not enough. Also have to restart the Outlook program. After adding the account successfully, reenable Adguard and all works well.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.microsoft.office.outlook&hl=en_US](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.microsoft.office.outlook%26hl%3Den_US)
### Comment
> Fresh setup of Outlook on Android. Adguard Public DNS configured at device level. 
> When you go to add a Yahoo account to Outlook, you get an error message and cannot proceed. 
> 
> Disabling Adguard only is not enough. Also have to restart the Outlook program. After adding the account successfully, reenable Adguard and all works well.

issue.title: www.themoviedb.org falsely blocked by Adguard QUIC DNS upstream

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version quic://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.themoviedb.org ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I'm using Adguard Home with Adguard QUIC (other protocols untested) DNS upstream configured. It returns `127.0.0.1` as an answer for `www.themoviedb.org`. As I understand, this is commonly used for blocking. However, I couldn't find it in your filterlists, besides the [allow rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bc4da839f3cbccbb786c94fe0dfa6b920fef3a2d/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L364) for unbreaking. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
As it's impossible not to include a blocklist I'm using, I chose AdGuard Base filter, but this is irrelevant because the upstream's response is itself `127.0.0.1`. I may be incorrect. ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.themoviedb.org falsely blocked by Adguard QUIC DNS upstream

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version quic://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.themoviedb.org ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I'm using Adguard Home with Adguard QUIC (other protocols untested) DNS upstream configured. It returns `127.0.0.1` as an answer for `www.themoviedb.org`. As I understand, this is commonly used for blocking. However, I couldn't find it in your filterlists, besides the [allow rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bc4da839f3cbccbb786c94fe0dfa6b920fef3a2d/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L364) for unbreaking. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
As it's impossible not to include a blocklist I'm using, I chose AdGuard Base filter, but this is irrelevant because the upstream's response is itself `127.0.0.1`. I may be incorrect. ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: One thing to note, though, is when I use `9.9.9.9` instead of Adguard's upstream, the answer is valid, so Adguard may be blocked some way. Really hard to tell.

comment.body:
>this is a popup

If it's a popup (related to `piano.io`) then isn't it okay to block it in "popups" section?
Please move it, if you don't agree with that.
https://www.golem.de/news/relaunch-golem-bekommt-ein-neues-aussehen-und-verliert-ein-de-2508-193783.html#cmts Comments of any article.

Which article are the comments broken? When I checked the site I could load their forum to see the comments. Maybe they changed something.
We do not hide links to self-promo articles. Only link to their self-promo payment page if it is annoying.
Working fine

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://app.getpoppy.ai/login](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.getpoppy.ai%2Flogin) ### Comment > Perfect! That's a crucial detail. Here's the updated GitHub issue: > Title > Endless login loop caused by browser extension conflict > Description > Bug Report > I'm experiencing an endless login loop on the Poppy AI web application that appears to be caused by a browser extension conflict. After successfully logging in and viewing my projects, clicking on any project redirects me back to the login page. The issue resolves completely when all browser extensions are disabled. > Steps to Reproduce > > Navigate to https://app.getpoppy.ai/login with extensions enabled > Click "Continue with Google" or enter email credentials > Successfully login and reach the boards page (https://app.getpoppy.ai/boards) > Click on any project/board from the list > Get redirected back to https://app.getpoppy.ai/login > > Workaround Found > The issue is completely resolved when I disable all browser extensions in Edge settings. This indicates an extension compatibility issue rather than a core application bug. > Expected Behavior > After clicking on a project, I should be taken to that project's workspace/dashboard regardless of enabled extensions. > Actual Behavior > Clicking on any project immediately redirects me back to the login page when extensions are enabled, but works perfectly when extensions are disabled. > Environment > > Browser: Microsoft Edge (Version [your version]) > OS: Windows [your version] > URL: https://app.getpoppy.ai/ > Extensions: Microsoft Edge Unminification Extension v135.0.3176.0 - ### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_1w7an6undxg.html?albumid=2526521608175701&s2=lequ2_page%3A5440790090270370&s3=lequ2_videoList&s4=lehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb&vtype=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_1w7an6undxg.html%3Falbumid%3D2526521608175701%26s2%3Dlequ2_page%253A5440790090270370%26s3%3Dlequ2_videoList%26s4%3Dlehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb%26vtype%3D0) ### Comment > AdGuard的“保护开关”无法关闭。 > 点击关闭后，等待5秒左右才自动刷新，刷新后能看到AdGuard的数字仍然是增加的，这说明没有暂停，于是点击图标查看“保护开关”是否处于关闭状态，结果“保护开关”又变回开启的状态了，多次尝试后都是一样无法关闭当前页面的保护，只能点击右上角的“暂停AdGuard保护”将所有页面都暂停才能暂停拦截。 > （提供的图片只是举例无法暂停拦截的状况，与图片上的提示无关，其他网站也是一样无法单独暂停） ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Did you actually try to login to AllTrails using a Google account?  Because it's 100% reproducible here, on multiple browsers, but only when AdGuard is enabled.

And sure, the Developer Console error regarding `play.google.com` may not be relevant - I wasn't suggesting that was the root cause issue, just sharing something I happened to notice.

issue.title: www.themoviedb.org falsely blocked by Adguard QUIC DNS upstream

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version quic://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.themoviedb.org ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I'm using Adguard Home with Adguard QUIC (other protocols untested) DNS upstream configured. It returns `127.0.0.1` as an answer for `www.themoviedb.org`. As I understand, this is commonly used for blocking. However, I couldn't find it in your filterlists, besides the [allow rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bc4da839f3cbccbb786c94fe0dfa6b920fef3a2d/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L364) for unbreaking. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
As it's impossible not to include a blocklist I'm using, I chose AdGuard Base filter, but this is irrelevant because the upstream's response is itself `127.0.0.1`. I may be incorrect. ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Can you show
```
dig CH www.themoviedb.org @94.140.14.14 | grep 'node-name.adguard-dns.com.'
```

output?

### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version quic://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.themoviedb.org ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I'm using Adguard Home with Adguard QUIC (other protocols untested) DNS upstream configured. It returns `127.0.0.1` as an answer for `www.themoviedb.org`. As I understand, this is commonly used for blocking. However, I couldn't find it in your filterlists, besides the [allow rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bc4da839f3cbccbb786c94fe0dfa6b920fef3a2d/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L364) for unbreaking. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
As it's impossible not to include a blocklist I'm using, I chose AdGuard Base filter, but this is irrelevant because the upstream's response is itself `127.0.0.1`. I may be incorrect. ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alltrails.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alltrails.com%2F) ### Comment > **Steps to reproduce:** > 1. Enable AdGuard in browser (reproducible in both Firefox and Safari) > 2. Attempt to login **using Google** to alltrails.com > > **Expected result:** > AllTrails website is logged in, using the chosen Google account. > > **Actual result:** > AllTrails website is _not_ logged in. comment.body:
Did you actually try to login to AllTrails using a Google account?  Because it's 100% reproducible here, on multiple browsers, but only when AdGuard is enabled.

And sure, the Developer Console error regarding `play.google.com` may not be relevant - I wasn't suggesting that was the root cause issue, just sharing something I happened to notice.

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_1w7an6undxg.html?albumid=2526521608175701&s2=lequ2_page%3A5440790090270370&s3=lequ2_videoList&s4=lehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb&vtype=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_1w7an6undxg.html%3Falbumid%3D2526521608175701%26s2%3Dlequ2_page%253A5440790090270370%26s3%3Dlequ2_videoList%26s4%3Dlehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb%26vtype%3D0) ### Comment > AdGuard的“保护开关”无法关闭。 > 点击关闭后，等待5秒左右才自动刷新，刷新后能看到AdGuard的数字仍然是增加的，这说明没有暂停，于是点击图标查看“保护开关”是否处于关闭状态，结果“保护开关”又变回开启的状态了，多次尝试后都是一样无法关闭当前页面的保护，只能点击右上角的“暂停AdGuard保护”将所有页面都暂停才能暂停拦截。 > （提供的图片只是举例无法暂停拦截的状况，与图片上的提示无关，其他网站也是一样无法单独暂停） ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alltrails.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alltrails.com%2F) ### Comment > **Steps to reproduce:** > 1. ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS ### AdGuard version quic://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.themoviedb.org ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I'm using Adguard Home with Adguard QUIC (other protocols untested) DNS upstream configured. It returns `127.0.0.1` as an answer for `www.themoviedb.org`. As I understand, this is commonly used for blocking. However, I couldn't find it in your filterlists, besides the [allow rule](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/bc4da839f3cbccbb786c94fe0dfa6b920fef3a2d/BaseFilter/sections/allowlist_stealth.txt#L364) for unbreaking. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
As it's impossible not to include a blocklist I'm using, I chose AdGuard Base filter, but this is irrelevant because the upstream's response is itself `127.0.0.1`. I may be incorrect. ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:

```
dig CH www.themoviedb.org @94.140.14.14 | grep 'node-name.adguard-dns.com.'
```

output?

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.alltrails.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.alltrails.com%2F) ### Comment > **Steps to reproduce:** > 1. Enable AdGuard in browser (reproducible in both Firefox and Safari) > 2. Attempt to login **using Google** to alltrails.com > > **Expected result:** > AllTrails website is logged in, using the chosen Google account. > > **Actual result:** > AllTrails website is _not_ logged in. Developer console (Firefox) shows this CORS error: > > > Cross-Origin Request Blocked: The Same Origin Policy disallows reading the remote resource at https://play.google.com/log?format=json&hasfast=true&authuser=0. comment.body:
Did you actually try to login to AllTrails using a Google account?  Because it's 100% reproducible here, on multiple browsers, but only when AdGuard is enabled.

And sure, the Developer Console error regarding `play.google.com` may not be relevant - I wasn't suggesting that was the root cause issue, just sharing something I happened to notice.

### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.iqiyi.com/v_1w7an6undxg.html?albumid=2526521608175701&s2=lequ2_page%3A5440790090270370&s3=lequ2_videoList&s4=lehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb&vtype=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.iqiyi.com%2Fv_1w7an6undxg.html%3Falbumid%3D2526521608175701%26s2%3Dlequ2_page%253A5440790090270370%26s3%3Dlequ2_videoList%26s4%3Dlehuo_content_10--_h59dc9rnb%26vtype%3D0) ### Comment > AdGuard的“保护开关”无法关闭。 > 点击关闭后，等待5秒左右才自动刷新，刷新后能看到AdGuard的数字仍然是增加的，这说明没有暂停，于是点击图标查看“保护开关”是否处于关闭状态，结果“保护开关”又变回开启的状态了，多次尝试后都是一样无法关闭当前页面的保护，只能点击右上角的“暂停AdGuard保护”将所有页面都暂停才能暂停拦截。 > （提供的图片只是举例无法暂停拦截的状况，与图片上的提示无关，其他网站也是一样无法单独暂停） ### Screenshots
